sentences.en: badly made furniture
sentences.cn: 做工粗糙的家具

sentences.en: Despite his illegal act, few people think badly of him.
sentences.cn: 尽管他干了违法的事情，但很少有人认为他不好。

sentences.en: Fruit-picking is boring, badly paid and very hard work.
sentences.cn: 摘水果的工作无聊，报酬低，还非常辛苦。

sentences.en: He had plastic surgery to help reconstruct his badly damaged face.
sentences.cn: 他做了整形手术以修复其严重受伤的面部。

sentences.en: He had wrenched his ankle badly from the force of the fall.
sentences.cn: 他因摔倒而严重扭伤了脚踝。

sentences.en: He has had his fingers burnt by deals that turned out badly.
sentences.cn: 几笔糟糕的生意让他吃了苦头。

sentences.en: He was beaten so badly that his brother didn’t recognize him.
sentences.cn: 他被打得连他哥哥都认不出他了。

sentences.en: He’s been limping badly ever since the skiing accident.
sentences.cn: 出了那次滑雪事故以后，他的腿跛得很厉害。

sentences.en: His mother was old, badly dressed and obviously downtrodden.
sentences.cn: 他母亲老了，衣着破旧，显然尝尽了苦难。

sentences.en: It hurt so badly he wished to cease to be.
sentences.cn: 他觉得疼痛难忍，恨不得死了算了。

sentences.en: It is not surprising they did so badly in last year's elections.
sentences.cn: 他们在去年选举中如此糟糕的表现并不奇怪。

sentences.en: Luke badly wanted a pass mark. Still does, I daresay.
sentences.cn: 卢克曾经很想能及格，他大概现在还是很想。

sentences.en: My left arm is badly bruised and I was slightly concussed.
sentences.cn: 我左臂严重擦伤，并有轻微脑震荡。

sentences.en: Planes landed at Bagram airport today carrying badly needed food and medicine.
sentences.cn: 运载急需食物和药品的飞机今天在巴格拉姆机场降落。

sentences.en: Rob did very badly in the History exam.
sentences.cn: 罗布的历史考得很差。

sentences.en: The company has been very badly managed.
sentences.cn: 这家公司的管理非常差。

sentences.en: The inves-tigators found that the underground pipes were badly corroded.
sentences.cn: 调查人员发现地下管道严重腐蚀。

sentences.en: The novel was translated badly into English.
sentences.cn: 这部小说被拙劣地翻成了英语。

sentences.en: The school is badly in need of (=  very much needs  ) some new computers.
sentences.cn: 学校急需一些新电脑。

sentences.en: The wagon's paint was badly chipped on the outside.
sentences.cn: 马车外边油漆斑驳。

sentences.en: They have both behaved very badly and I am very hurt.
sentences.cn: 他们俩都很不友善，让我非常难过。

sentences.en: Things started to go badly wrong (=  go wrong in a serious way  ) for Eric after he lost his job.
sentences.cn: 埃里克失去工作以后，一切都很不如意。

sentences.en: Water supplies and other public utilities were badly affected.
sentences.cn: 供水以及其他公用事业受到了严重影响。

sentences.en: We badly wanted to help, but there was nothing we could do.
sentences.cn: 我们很想帮忙，可又无计可施。

words.tran_cn: 非常，很；严重地，厉害地；恶劣地

trans.tran_cn: 差，拙劣地，很，非常，严重地，负面地，（钱）少
trans.tran_en: to a great or serious degree
